targets.rawSql:
SELECT   
    service_name as "Service Name",
    database as Database,
    fingerprint AS "Query", 
    avgIf(m_query_time_sum / m_query_time_cnt, m_query_time_cnt > 0) AS "Avg Execution Time"
FROM pmm."metrics"
WHERE 
    period_start >= $__fromTime 
    AND period_start <= $__toTime 
    AND if(length('${service_name:csv}') = 0,1, service_name in ($service_name))
    AND service_type = 'postgresql'
    AND database NOT IN ('postgres', '<database name not available>', 'template1')
    AND fingerprint NOT IN ('SELECT version()')
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_stat_%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_replication_slots%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_publication%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_last_wal_receive_lsn%'
GROUP BY 
    service_name, 
    database, 
    fingerprint
ORDER BY "Avg Execution Time" DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.description: Postgresql spent the most time on these queries.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT   
    service_name as "Service Name",
    database as Database,
    fingerprint AS "Query", 
    sum(m_query_time_sum) AS "Execution Time Summary"
FROM pmm."metrics"
WHERE 
    period_start >= $__fromTime 
    AND period_start <= $__toTime 
    AND if(length('${service_name:csv}') = 0,1, service_name in ($service_name))
    AND service_type = 'postgresql'
    AND database NOT IN ('postgres', '<database name not available>', 'template1')
    AND fingerprint NOT IN ('SELECT version()')
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_stat_%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_replication_slots%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_publication%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_last_wal_receive_lsn%'
GROUP BY 
    service_name,  
    database, 
    fingerprint 
ORDER BY "Execution Time Summary" DESC
LIMIT 100;

panels.title: Top 10 time spent

panels.description: Queries which executed the most time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT   
    service_name as "Service Name",
    database as Database,
    fingerprint AS "Query", 
    sum(num_queries) AS "Executed"
FROM pmm."metrics"
WHERE 
    period_start >= $__fromTime 
    AND period_start <= $__toTime 
    AND if(length('${service_name:csv}') = 0,1, service_name in ($service_name))
    AND service_type = 'postgresql'
    AND database NOT IN ('postgres', '<database name not available>', 'template1')
    AND fingerprint NOT IN ('SELECT version()')
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_stat_%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_replication_slots%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_publication%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_last_wal_receive_lsn%'
GROUP BY 
    service_name, 
    database, 
    fingerprint
ORDER BY "Executed" DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Top 10 Queries Executed the most

panels.description: Queries which writes the most rows

targets.rawSql:
SELECT   
    service_name as "Service Name",
    database as Database,
    fingerprint AS "Query", 
    sum(m_rows_sent_sum) AS "Affected Rows"
FROM pmm."metrics"
WHERE 
    period_start >= $__fromTime 
    AND period_start <= $__toTime 
    AND if(length('${service_name:csv}') = 0,1, service_name in ($service_name))
    AND service_type = 'postgresql'
    AND database NOT IN ('postgres', '<database name not available>', 'template1')
    AND fingerprint NOT IN ('SELECT version()')
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_stat_%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_replication_slots%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_publication%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_last_wal_receive_lsn%'
    AND cmd_type not in ('SELECT','')
GROUP BY 
    service_name, 
    database, 
    fingerprint
ORDER BY "Affected Rows" DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Top 10 Queries writing the most

panels.description: These Queries are affecting the most rows.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT   
    service_name as "Service Name",
    database as Database,
    fingerprint AS "Query", 
    sum(m_rows_sent_sum) AS "Rows Affected"
FROM pmm."metrics"
WHERE 
    period_start >= $__fromTime 
    AND period_start <= $__toTime 
    AND if(length('${service_name:csv}') = 0,1, service_name in ($service_name))
    AND service_type = 'postgresql'
    AND database NOT IN ('postgres', '<database name not available>', 'template1')
    AND fingerprint NOT IN ('SELECT version()')
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_stat_%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_replication_slots%'

    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_last_wal_receive_lsn%'
GROUP BY

ORDER BY "Rows Affected" DESC

panels.title: Top 10 Queries Affected the most rows

panels.description: These users executed the most queries

targets.rawSql:
SELECT   
    service_name as "Service Name",
    database as Database,
    username as Username,
    sum(num_queries) AS "Executed Queries"
FROM pmm."metrics"
WHERE 
    period_start >= $__fromTime 
    AND period_start <= $__toTime 
    AND if(length('${service_name:csv}') = 0,1, service_name in ($service_name))
    AND service_type = 'postgresql'
    AND database NOT IN ('postgres', '<database name not available>', 'template1')
    AND fingerprint NOT IN ('SELECT version()')
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_stat_%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_replication_slots%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_publication%'
    AND fingerprint NOT ILIKE '%pg_last_wal_receive_lsn%'
GROUP BY 
    service_name, 
    database,
    username
ORDER BY "Executed Queries" DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Top 10 User Executed the most queries
